nodes.name: batchToggleWhitelist

batchToggleWhitelist(address[],bool).details: Batch whitelisted/unwhitelist multiple addresses, with _toggled being true/false.

confirmOperatorsContract().details: The function should be called from new operators contract by admin to insure that operatorsPending address      is the real contract address.

getOperatorsContract().return: The address of the BaseOperators contract.

getOperatorsPending().return: The pending address of the BaseOperators contract.

initialize(address).details: Initialization instead of constructor, called once. The setOperatorsContract function can be called only by Admin role with      confirmation through the operators contract.

isAdminOrSystem(address).return: If '_account' has admin or system privileges.

isOperatorOrSystem(address).return: If '_account' has operator or system privileges.

isWhitelisted(address).details: Getter to determine if address is whitelisted.

params._account: address to determine if whitelisted or not.

setOperatorsContract(address).details: Set the new the address of Operators contract, should be confirmed from operators contract by calling confirmFor(addr)      where addr is the address of current contract instance. This is done to prevent the case when the new contract address is      broken and control of the contract can be lost in such case

toggleWhitelist(address,bool).details: Toggle whitelisted/unwhitelisted on _account address, with _toggled being true/false.
